doc.title: Passion Play: Judas' Betrayal and the Messiah's Arrest
doc.plot: Christ is here seen in the foreground with His disciples apart from Him, excepting three who lie upon the ground near him as He prays. Judas is seen to look about among the trees and then stride forward and kiss Jesus. Malchus, at the head of a guard of soldiers, orders two of them to advance, Jesus is seized. He surrenders and is dragged away, followed by His disciples.
